description.value: Family history tool diseases and cause of death

map.value: for $gender in /ClinicalDocument/recordTarget/patientRole/patient/administrativeGenderCode/@code[.=('F', 'M')] return if ($gender='F') then 'LA3-6' else if ($gender='M') then 'LA2-8' else 'LA46-8'

for $time in /ClinicalDocument/recordTarget/patientRole/patient/birthTime/@value return if (string-length($time)=4) then $time else if (string-length($time)=6) then concat(substring($time,1,4), '-', substring($time, 5)) else concat(substring($time,1,4), '-', substring($time, 5,2), '-', substring($time,7))
